dialogue.text: M-miss Tangy! Please put him down… this instant!
Gah-! Ugh…
You don’t know how satisfying it was to do that.
Now get this through your thick skull, Sour. You’re not special. All you have is luck… and lucky is all you’ll ever be.
[A few weeks later since Sour's scuffle with Tangy…]
I should've been over this already…
I can't help but feel awful about how our first week together turned out still. All my plans going wrong… losing my cool in front of her… ugh…
Sour? You're ok, right? Please tell me you’re ok.
Urgh, yeah…
Sweet, I… Geez, I'm so sorry about all this, I really am! I didn't think she'd be around, and-
It's ok, Sour. You don't have to explain everything to me right now. Please, just take a deep breath for me, ok?
*deep breath*
Wait, Sweet… doesn't your boat leave soon?
Indeed, but… I don't want to leave you while you feel like this. So, please, raise your head and look at me, Sour.
There’s so much I want to say, and I know there’s so little time left right now... but there’s always going to be more time for us in the future. I’ll wait as long as it takes.
Maybe soon, I'll get to share my hometown with you like you shared yours with me. The Preheats is always open to you.
No matter what happens, or where we end up, or even how things come to be, we'll be together again another day to make even more wonderful memories.
Because despite all that happened… This has still been the most wonderful week of my life.
It might be hard to believe, but I mean that… with all my heart.
I... have to go now... but we can talk more once I'm back home, ok?
*deep breath*
Yeah... I'd like that.
Sour... I love you so much.
I… I love you too, Sweet.
I gotta make it up to her somehow… but I ain’t gonna see her again for a while.
I could take a flight over to her place, but the ticket prices hiked up real bad this month. Just another damn problem to add to the list.
Bring me my usual. And make it nice an’ snappy! I gotsta bail quick before ol’ Vinegar spots me ship.
…aye, ye know I always tip handsomely! Yahaharr!
…I don’t even know anymore, man. This blows.
Aye, ye be talkin’ a boatload o' troubles out loud there, boy. What ails ye?
Oh, uh... Sorry, my bad.
(I really gotta stop doing that…)
No need for apologizin’! If ye thoughts be loud enough to escape yer head, then it's better spoken than left unsaid!
…somethin’ caught in ye throat now?
…what the hell are you?
Ya can’t be more blind than me, boy! Not when both yer eyes still work! I’m a pirate, tried and true!
Yeah, I see that, clearly. But… what for? You a new act lookin’ to make it big in Enzync or something?
This is no act, I can assure ye! And I can prove it to ye real quick! Come, step outside! Hold me drink, bartender!
Take a gander at my beauty of a ship, boy!
-THE HELL?! How’d you get a whole ass pirate ship in here?!
Very carefully. Efficiently, too!
I make me trips here quite fast, ya hear? The Coast Guard isn’t partial to me crew’s visits, but the drinks they be servin’ here are more than worth a little scuffle!
You crazy, man?!
Some may think so, but I prefer to think of it as bein’ a lil’ adventurous!
Now, enough about ME, tell me what’s botherin’ YE, boy! Sailors love a good tale!
…how do I even transition from this?
I mean… It's just some relationship business. I feel like I screwed up real bad the last time I saw my partner. Wanted to treat her to a nice few weeks away from her home, then everything fell apart.
I want to make it up to her so bad, but it’s hard when she lives across the ocean-
Across the ocean, ye say?
Yeah, she’s all the way over in the Preheats.
The Preheats? Ah, that place takes me back! An ol’ colleague of mine lives down there, a real quiet fellow he is. Been meaning to give ‘im a visit.
Tell ye what, boy! I’ll getcha cross the ocean waves to the docks of Corianda! Then yer one step closer to reaching yer sweetie pie!
Just promise me that if ye see that ol’ lug out there, tell ‘im Salty’s waitin’ to get the ol’ group back together!
F-forreal?!
(Oh god… am I really about to take this weirdo up on this? I still freakin’ HATE boats!)
(Ghh… but I don’t know how else I’m gonna see her again soon… ah, screw it.)
S-sure, y’know what, man? I’ll take you up on that.
Yarr! That’s the ticket, boy! Now let’s get ready to sail!
Ahoy, me hearties! We’ve got ourselves a young spirit needin’ to be set to sea! Adobo, prepare the sails and the supplies!
Aye aye, Captain Salty!
And Sharp, round up the rest of our crew, then take to the crow’s nest! Oh, and fetch me drink from the bar, too.
…aye.
(Oh, I’m so gonna regret this once we hit the ocean… But… I want to see her again so badly. I’ll send her a text that I’m on my way.)
